title: eMedia Piano For Dummies v2 - Amazon Exclusive Edition with 150+ Additional Lessons
description: Start playing piano today the For Dummies way! eMedia Piano For Dummies lets you take piano lessons at your own pace, in your own home. It combines the For Dummies attitude with eMedia interactive technology to help you learn faster. It includes easy piano songs in a multitude of styles, from Billy Joel's “Piano Man” to J.S. Bach's "Minuet in G" to keep you interested and having fun. eMedia helps you learn piano basics with easy-to-follow piano lessons by Irma Irene Justicia, M.A., who has taught at the renowned Juilliard School of Music. Learn piano today with this critically acclaimed beginner piano tutorial.
